## inject() function

Inject a Blockly editor into the specified container element (usually a div).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function inject(container: Element | string, opt_options?: BlocklyOptions): WorkspaceSvg;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  container | Element \| string | Containing element, or its ID, or a CSS selector. |
|  opt\_options | [BlocklyOptions](./blockly.blocklyoptions_interface.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional dictionary of options. |

**Returns:**

[WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md)

Newly created main workspace.
